data.message: Dude wtf, why yall slinging hate towards him for asking someone to donate. He can't do everything himself and he earned that money, he doesn't have to give it away everytime there's a disaster then hed be broke

replies.message: Eminem has blown up a $20 pair of shoes to cost thousands, and he has enticed his obsessive fans - to give up that money. Eminem and company has operated a dozen charities, and every charity, has enticed his obsessive fans to donate. Do the math. Eminem has approximately 20 million fans on one of his Twitter accounts. If one fourth of those fans donate a dollar - 5 million!

A Sweet reply to all the fuddu rappers.
Must listen
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-Kx1I0aiGtA
